metadata.name: The Cursed King
metadata.description: The cursed king, known only as Skull, is a figure shrouded in mystery and terror. Legend has it that he was once a powerful ruler, revered by his people and feared by his enemies. But he made a deal with dark forces, trading his soul for immortality and eternal power. In exchange, he was transformed into a fearsome being with a skull for a head, forever cursed to wander the earth as a twisted, undead king.
